website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable head piece with a zoomable beam. Comfortable strap mounting is totally hands-free
pros: Offers three light modes and adjustable light piece
Zoomable lens focuses beam for higher density lighting
Rechargeable batteries included with charging dock and various charging cables for wall socket, USB, and car lighter
cons: Some users found the straps too short to mount over a helmet or hard hat

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this headlamp - solid tactile tilting of the lens. It clicks in each step and stays put while you're running, jogging, hiking, etc. - batteries included - of course is always nice - comes with many charging options: AC, usb, car DC There isn't anything about this headlamp that I don't like. The description is clear - you get what is advertised. Nothing more, nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Everstar

customer_reviews.title: Zoomable 3 modes Super Bright LED Headlamp with Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: item came as described, nicely fit on head, fast charging, worked for me for 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Protsenko

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this head lamp! It is comfortable on my head; the straps adjust to you can custome fit to your head. It is super bright and the batteries last a long time. Easy to charge. I bought it primarily for exercising with my dogs outside at night, but also as a luxury on the rare occasion we lose power! I use it daily, and even ordered a second one for my husband. It’s great for camping, too. See photo for how bright it is after dark.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just how it advertise👍
customer_reviews.text: Since i love/like this product i will write and post a picture about this product. It's very bright and just how it advertise. Thumbs up👍👍👍worth every penny. 1st pic dim mode 2nd pic zoom out 4th pic bright mode, 5th pic no light, last pic taken with iphone 6s plus camera with flash on(no other light than the iphone flash)
customer_reviews.author: alexander payna

customer_reviews.title: Started blinking a slow blink the 2nd night I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company has contacted me and is going to replace my headlamp! I will update again when I receive the new light. This was my 2nd of these. The first one still works great except for the charger cord insert. I have to play with it and maneuver heavy objects pressed around the connector just to get the light to stay red. The female end it much bigger than the male end (<--- not a joke) lol. The light itself is awesome! I tried sending an email to the seller about it but never heard back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ed G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product while it worked. Only worker 3 times. After it stopped working, I tried charging it. It charged as expected. But would never turn on. Being halfway competent with tools I opened it up to see why. First I discovered that there was a crimped wire behind the light that might be the issue, however, I was never able to get voltage to this wire. Next I examined the battery box and discovered two of the three wires going to the light assembly had broken at the solder joint. While trying to hold them to their respected contacts, the third wire broke. I am now the proude owner of a collection of junk I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable batteries don't last
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spend extra money on rechargeable batteries since I didn't want to keep replacing batteries. They pooped out after 5 months. And it will take at least $20 to replace these. I am very disappointed that they didn't last longer. Other than that, the unit is rather heavy on the head. It is very bright and effective for the work I must do on the farm in the dark. UPDATE: The seller was kind enough to send me a whole new unit due to the review. But guess what? It only took one month for the unit to completely stop working. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Love the lp but has one significant flaw
customer_reviews.text: Love the light but with one significant flaw, lightweight and really lights the way. Unfortunately, the batteries are held in by a rubber cap that fits over the holder top. As soon as you start running, the batteries work themselves out of the holder and you have to stop and put the batteries in again. Only to happen after a few more steps. Very poor design, I wrapped Gorilla tape all around and that seems to hold them in place. But, a pain to change batteries out in the field if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Overheats like crazy! After using it for 10 min, I tried to adjust it and almost burned my finger. The metal adjustment part and the bulb get really really hot. I wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.author: kdizz

customer_reviews.title: There are slits in the lamp holder so the straps can be easily removed. While I can see this as a ...
customer_reviews.text: My main beef with this lamp is the manner in which the headstraps are attached to the light itself. There are slits in the lamp holder so the straps can be easily removed. While I can see this as a benefit to runners wanting to easily remove it to wash sweat from the band, it's irritating to me when the straps fall off while putting the lamp on. I'm not a runner and use this only for working under cabinets or other jobs where lighting is insufficient. Removable straps don't help me all so I hot glued the slips closed. Easy fix but I don't like having to mess with something I just bought.
customer_reviews.author: Superiordreamin

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't hold a charge for more than an hour on the bright setting.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headlamp when needing extra light while in dark places for remodelling work etc. The high setting is very bright, exactly what I wanted. However, the battery won't hold a charge for more than an hour. After roughly 30 minutes, the light dims down to the lower setting, then goes out completely. I usually will do work in dark places for more than an hour and therefore need a light that will last just as long, if not longer. In general, I think the headlamp is of good quality. But the battery is a major issue and is proprietary to the headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Egan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, then flaked out.
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the others mentioned here, I started off great with the GRDE 3 Mode headlight. It was very handy to have a light source like this for lots of tasks. However, after just over a year, the LED became intermittent. Replacing the batteries didn't help. It appears that either the wiring from the battery is bad, or the LED is just flaking out. I'm giving it a second chance and have ordered a new one. I'm hoping that either I got a lemon, or that the company has addressed the issue that caused the LED to quit running correctly. I hope it works. I'll re-post after I've had the second one for a length of time.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Not as waterproof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The LED portion may be waterproof, but the switch is not. I've had mine get thoroughly soaked and the switch quit working until it dried out. This light is really bright and I use it frequently. The manufacturer needs to add a diode to the battery charger. If you happen to leave the charger plugged into the light while the charger is not plugged into the power, it WILL drain the batteries overnight. The straps pop off regularly for me, but are easy to reinstall. They need a better design. With these limitations in mind, I have purchased 3 so far. The price is right for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: will break and company will harass you to remove your review
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, it broke with in a month, got another.. that one broke. Leave a negative review and the company will harass you to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: purchased because it was on such a good sale, the battery pack is too large and ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased because it was on such a good sale, the battery pack is too large and sits on the back of your head. If you are doing anything exerting then the weight of the batteries causes problems, if you under your vehicle or anytime on your back the battery pack is uncomfortable. The light itself is bright as he11 so that part is great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMEND YOU BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Can you say BRIGHT! I use this for tattooing but this thing is great for any hands free light use. My brother asked to use it to check under his car (hes a mechanic) and hes buying one now! The brightest option is too bright too tattoo with most times, so i use the second level and its perfect and still very very bright. Another very cool feature on this product is the zoom! It can focus on a specific thing your heart desires. If you need a hands free light source that you wont be disappointed in, look no further you've found it!. P.S. Its a GREAT price too!
customer_reviews.author: Adam M TattooingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So 5 weeks after I bought this, it has flickered and died. It has been used approx 2 1/2 hours a day, so I can see to clean the barn. Never wet, dropped or abused, as I REALLY need one of these. It also got very hot within about 15 or 20 minutes, enough so I had to take it off. I paid good money for this light, and am very disappointed. Will not buy again, do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pip

customer_reviews.title: Great, incredibly bright, headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This thing easily lasted a week, which is roughly 6-7 hours. Seems like a well made and durable headlamp. I load and deliver construction equipment so for an hour or two every morning I use this. The light is incredibly bright. The unit is heavier than expected but that’s not a big deal. Great deal on a great product. It lasted about 14 months and the wire shorted out where it exits the battery case. I use it pretty heavily five days a week so I think that’s actually pretty good considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Like Having a Thousand Suns on Your Forehead
customer_reviews.text: It's bright. More bright than you're even imagining. I won't do a walk-through on a house without this guy. Also, when working on something where you need both hands, it's amazing because both the tilt and the focal lens are adjustable. Even though this comes with batteries AND the charger is built in, I went ahead and ordered rechargeable 18650 batteries with it since they are the weirdo high-power batteries. If you're going to get into the high-power lamp world, you're gonna need to get over the batteries, all of the big guys use these types of batteries. I recommend this lamp
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sterzenbach

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This makes the second one so far and both still working. They are extremely bright and have three settings. Bright, less bright and flashing. You can also adjust from flood light wide area around you to spot light shinning far away. The light will tilt and has a good detent to keep it there. Use hunting and fishing so far after several years of use had no problems or complaints. Battery life is great. I plug them up every once in a while and use the all the time. Adjustable head band that’s more comfortable than the single ones. Best one I’ve found for the money
customer_reviews.author: brodysdad

customer_reviews.title: Proprietary charger
customer_reviews.text: It uses a proprietary charger when in fact it could just easily use regular micro usb charging or better yet Type-C charging. You can still individually charge the batteries if you so liked it as it uses 18650 cells. The design wise, it's simple to use and you don't need to cycle that many functions but there are better products out there with better designs.
customer_reviews.author: Iyiahn

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second "headlamp" I've used. The other one did not have a battery pack separate from the light unit on the forehead.While this one lasts longer between charges, it's too heavy and the battery back on the back makes it impossible to use if you are lying on your back looking up at the underside of a car or other machinery. I also find that the straps constantly come off the light due to the way the straps are mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Dadeo

customer_reviews.title: My first review on amazon. Made out of 90% ...
customer_reviews.text: My first review on amazon. Made out of 90% plastic. Small amount of aluminum will burn you. -Pros Bright(very bright) -Cons Batteries will not stay in place. Have to use electrical tape to secure them. This will deminish supposed water resistance. VERY IMPORTANTNT After one hour of continuous use I felt a worm sancation on the back of my head. Batteries got very hot. Aluminum part got so hot, it gave me a blister(see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly useful device
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp has so many uses it's hard to know where to start. Outdoor gardening after dark. Wildlife feeding and observation after dark or before dawn. Searching the obscure corners of closets and the garage for some item I need. Searching for some pesky small object I've dropped that's gone missing under the sofa or behind a bookcase. Trips in the crawl space to check that the termites haven't decided to move in and snack on the infrastructure of my house. The headlamp is comfortable to wear for extended periods and once I started using it I wondered how I'd lived without it before. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra C.

customer_reviews.title: Neat headlamp, pretty cool features
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best headlamps by far my husband has used, and he’s bought many of them. It lights up very brightly, fits perfectly on his head and has room to stretch so it’s not so tight and uncomfortable. One of the coolest features to me is that it’s waterproof of course to a certain extent of course. The headlamp adjusts according to what your doing or working on in his situation, and it had rechargeable batteries!!! I can’t stress how important that is!!! It saves on those expensive batteries over time. He absolutely loves it, says it was definitely a great buy thus far!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bright headlamp that illuminates whatever you need to see with ease. I got it for working on my car because of the fact that your hands are free when you are wearing them. The adjustable settings make for a snug comfortable fit on my head also. It has 3 led settings..... One is bright, one is dim and the other is flashing, which I have no use for to be honest, but I am guessing it may be for biking at night. This isn't too heavy on your head and adjusts to the angle that you need light directed in
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dean

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks. Pretty much have to keep it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life sucks. Pretty much have to keep it on a charger when not in use. Light output is good though. EDIT: The company gave me a full refund. Still not impressed with the product and my review will stay the same so that everyone knows not to expect good battery life. Company gets 5 stars. Product gets 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kohen Marzolf

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this as a gift for someone who uses a headlamp daily. For decades he has owned many brands, and said this is absolutely the best he has ever used. In addition to producing the largest range of clear bright light, it illuminates in a circle, like a spotlight. The rechargeable batteries last longer than he has experienced, and the product itself is well made and sturdy. It stays in place and doesn’t move around like other brands, and he loves the car charging feature. The price was excellent and product was delivered promptly. It was a true joy to give a gift of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright, High Quality versatile light!!!
customer_reviews.text: As stated this headlamp is super bright , damn near blinded myself when I first turned it on! Quality is top notch and the different settings give a lot of versatility to what you can use this for. I personally will be using to take the dog out at night, while working on my car and any other time I need to bring light to an area I will be working in. The fiance already wants me to get her once for her early morning or night runs. Overall, very impressed and will easily recommend to anyone looking to make a headlamp purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David Kernan

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a week of first use
customer_reviews.text: After unboxing, I was already disappointed in the feel of the product—it looks and feels cheap. It was very bright, so I decided to give it a shot. The plastic clip that holds the band in place snapped after maybe the third use, but I was still able to keep it on my head. After a few more uses, it wouldn’t turn off. I found out this was because condensation (from sweat; and note—I’m not a very sweaty person) had gotten into the battery compartment, which is not sealed properly to prevent this. At this point, this cheap piece of garbage is where it belongs—in the trash. Would not recommend. There are much better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Resolved: Extremely poor durability/quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: seller got in touch with me. Very courteous and offered a replacement or refund. And processed refund for the defective light immediately. ________________________________ Bought 2 of these as i need a headlamp for detailing my vehicles. After using it 2 or 3 days one of the lights will not stay on. It keeps flashing intermittently and is extremely frustrating. It also gets very hot when left on over 10 minutes. The light is very bright and lasts a good amount of time when it actually worked. However I’m extremely disappointed as the light barely got any use before starting to give trouble. Wonder how long the second one will last maybe one was a lemon?
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: On the downside, possibly dorky.  On the upside, possibly life saving.
customer_reviews.text: While I may look like a dork wearing these, they are super handy for putting on snow chains in the dark which is all that matters to me. Snow chains and avoiding death on mountain roads in more important to me than possible dorkage. I keep them plugged inside my center console and know I always have a bright hands free flashlight ready in case of snow or other emergencies. They aren't as cool as Splinter Cell goggles, but at $20 bucks, one cannot expect that. Alas, maybe some day I will have those. Wait...if only these were green:
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: A Useful Hand when you need both of yours!
customer_reviews.text: There are quite a few times I’ve needed a light and it’s impossible to hold the flashlight while trying to shine a light and use two hands to work on something. I received this and found it to be perfect for what I will need it for. The instructions were worded a bit different, but got the drift of what was trying to be said as, thankfully, it doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure some of these things out! This is an item that will be used occasionally and will come in extremely handy. Light is bright enough when turned on, and like the three choices of bright light, lower light and strobe. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to go on my hardhat at work. I charged it for 6 hours as recommended and it lasted all of two days with intermittent use. I charged again for six hours and it would never turn back on. I would not recommend use for any kind of costruction. Even considering how bright it is, there is absolutely no longevity to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Make everyone jealous with this light!
customer_reviews.text: Make your friends and other people jealous with this light. It's incredibly bright on high mode, I typically use it in low mode most of the time. Battery lasts long enough for all of my attic or under car work/late night hikes/trail blazing activities that I may need it for. The metal lens housing can get a little hot when you leave it on high mode, so beware!! Protip: use the USB charger when at home for faster charging with a 2.1 or 2.4 amp usb charger, your batteries will charge almost twice as fast. The AC adaptor that comes with the unit is only rated for 1amp worth of current.
customer_reviews.author: S HEPNER

customer_reviews.title: Cant believe how comfortable this thing is.
customer_reviews.text: Its really a solid light. I use it for fishing the bay here in florida. Lasted a long time. The real key here is its adjustable for the angle its pointing, and the sizeand strength of the beam focus. Above all else...its the most comfortble one ive ever put on my head. I could wear it all day and probably forget i had it on. Also had a red light on the back of it when on, so if anyone were behind you theyd see you i suppose. Update: 01-02-2018 One of the lithium 18650s wont charge anymore. Never dropped or anything. Flashlight is fine but batteries are not up to the task apparently
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: They made it right
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time, and did charge it correctly. 2nd time I went to use it, the high beam began to blink, pushed the button several times to cycle through the different light settings, Still doing the same thing. Now it will not turn on......Don't waste your money. UPDATE:, they contacted me and sent a new unit which, at this time is working very well. Great customer service! I understand that sometimes things are broken. Having them replace it made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the money - over stated light output.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good light and well worth the money. I just don't think these companies should be allowed to over state their light output like they do. It is no where near 1800 lumens. For comparison, typical cars put out about 700 lumens of light per bulb on low so this thing SHOULD be brighter than a car. It's not even close. I would guess it puts out closer to 400 lumens but for the price, it's a good deal. It is well made and the adjustable zoom on the light is great. I also like that it can charge with USB.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Was my "go to" light at first
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this headlamp it worked flawless. It is super bright and was very useful. I am not sure what the warrantee is on it but right around the year mark it started failing. The light was plenty bright and it seemed to charge just fine but when it was on it would flicker on and off very rapidly like there was a loose connection somewhere. It flickers so much that I can no longer use it. Really disappointed because I liked this light a lot.
customer_reviews.author: agent8

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Headlamp worked great, when it worked. The 3rd week I used it the power button stopped working or gets stuck. I'd have to press it really hard to get it to work, then it pretty much stopped working. I reported it to the seller and they emailed me wanting more info and for me to show them the power button, yeah ok? Come on over to my house and I'll show you I guess.. forget it. In fairness, I have another unit I bought a long time ago and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great work light for dim or dark areas.
customer_reviews.text: This light is rechargeable with a heavy battery pack on the back side which also contains a red light. This feature also makes it a very useful bicycle riding light as well as a low visibility work light. Charge time is a bit long but I bought another one for that purpose. When I have to work under the sink on faucets or plumbing, this light is the only way to fly. It can never make that task enjoyable but at least I can see what I am dong. Useful battery time is also pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: John Park

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright and constructed very well
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and turned on today. Extremely bright!!! Will be using mostly for auto detailing and auto repair use. The zoom feature is easy to use. At first I thought it was a twist feature. Found it’s a push and pull telescoping design. It has a bit of weight to it. I’ll see if that is to much discomfort after use, and I’ll update this Review. My fist initial thought is that it’s designed and built well. Only time will tell for sure. Great looking and again it seems constructed well. Can’t wait to use while detailing!
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I wear mine every day working on cars, and occasionally while jogging at night. Lasted over two years of daily use. I bought an extra battery charger and 2 batteries so I can never be without light. On full brightness I get about 2 hours of light, at low light, which is still bright, I get about 4 hours and charging is fast, maybe 30 min. I have given these as gifts and everyone raves about them
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN COULSON

customer_reviews.title: I previously owned a three light set up like this. The elastic on the bands weakened to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's clear all of these headlamps that look similar but have different names are manufactured by the same company. I previously owned a three light set up like this. The elastic on the bands weakened to annoyance and the soldering for the power button, charge port, and battery connections are of terrible quality and all failed eventually. *This was over the course of 15 months of heavy use.* In addition to my worry of these problems occurring with this product it is very hot during operation. Also, the power button on the side is annoying. The "focus" is mostly useless and requires two hands to alter anyway. The clicking ring on my previous model was a much better design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I likie a lot :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different lights of this type. This particular model has an adjustable beam and I have it attached to my hardhat. I'm an electrician that works industrial and commercial and I am a bit color blind (most guys are and don't know it)... The color of this beam is very helpful verifying the brown/dark grey/dark green colors that give me trouble in dim lighting situations. This light is rechargeable, has an adjustable beam, balances nicely with the battery in back and light in front. For a Chinese made cheapo light I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Hard To Impress

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a bright headlamp? Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on the brightness advertised and what people wrote about in reviews. They were not lying. This light is Bright! I love the "zoom" feature but not the light on the back of the battery pack. Although I'm camping and not riding a bicycle around town. It's a bit on the heavy side and does get uncomfortable after a while. It also gets quite warm after being on for 30 min or more. Also it's an uncomforting thing to think the only thing between your head and the 2 button top 1860 batteries is a thin piece of rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while,,,,
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was the best thing ever,, and only used it on occasion, I recharged it before using it, and now after I know I have had it for a year,, It only has a few hrs of use, and it will now only work for about a minute on a full charge then the light will Blink on and off. I checked the battery connections like in another post, thats not it. Its Not something I will buy again. And unfortunately I have another at our travel trailer, and I will bet its going to go bad also.
customer_reviews.author: Gina McGlothin

customer_reviews.title: short warranty and not flexible
customer_reviews.text: I used to like lamp. Lamp broke in about 11 months. I contacted support at 13 months. Support said I was over limit by one month and offered me 30% off. My guess is they looked at this as a business transaction. This is certainly one approach. Another approach would be to consider their lamps should not last only 11-13 months. I have other (newer) lamps from them, and I'm concerned these will go back within 30 . Now I'm concerned my other lamps will fail soon also. I wish I would have just have spent a little more and bought a Petzl. My old Petzl worked for about 3-4 years until I lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Boooooooo this thing stinks UPDATE it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: POS don’t waste your money. It stopped working within the first few times out. UPDATE: This item is awesome. I totally change my opinion from 1 star to 5. I read the instructions again which said it needed a 6 hour charge. I left it on the charger for 6 hours even though in 2 hours it was ready and BOOM. So much light. I left it in the wall charger so next time I'll experiment with the car charger and see if it wasn't charging it appropriately. It also comes with a USB charger. Definitely buying another
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with this headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this headlamp! The battery pack lasts forever. I mostly only use it for short walks at night, or taking out the trash. It's **very** bright, way more so than I expected, and so great to have a hands-free light. I often use the dimmer setting because the brightest one is sometime too much. There's also a flasher. I was hesitant about the rechargeable batteries, thinking I would have to charge them all the time, but that's not the case, the batteries hold a charge for very long time.
customer_reviews.author: templink

customer_reviews.title: THIS WILL NOT WORK. SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to walk my dog at night. It worked great for a month or two. Then the power button just stopped working (we charged it after using it every time). The batteries are also not very secure, and make poor connections, making charging difficult. I just wanted a headlamp that would work - so I wouldn't be hit by a car, and could see where I was walking. Thought this could at least do that. Nope. Apparently not. DO NOT BUY THIS. THE WAY IT WORKS/DOESN'T WORK IS PHYSICALLY DANGEROUS. My mother hurt herself trying to walk up some stairs when it flickered off. Talking to our lawyer to sue.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary P.

customer_reviews.title: Good helpfull product, may be a tad too bright.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice product. I used it for camping, and playing corn hole at night haha. To be honest the light is just a little too bright, for if you have to use it around people you cannot face them at all, even when the light is facing down. Maybe 4 modes in the future redesign?? Maybe interchangeable milk plexi, help dull and spread light for use in groups. That would be perfect!! So that's 4/5. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Coletrain

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Tee Hive product instead .... less than 1/2 the price of the GRDE
customer_reviews.text: User guide hard to understand. It did not state that batteries were already installed or how to access batteries to remove plastic cover.. Unable to charge batteries after plastic removed .... tried all three charging methods. Contacted Totobay as suggested .... never got reply .... so returned item to Amazon and bought T5000 Move U Outdoors 5000 Lumen CREE XM-L T6 Rechargeable LED Camping, Running, Cycling Headlamp Black One Size for $10. And it is great! Easy to charge .... 5000 lumen. Batteries were not installed but packed separately. Buy the Tee Hive product instead of this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Runnyknose

customer_reviews.title: worked nice till it started to random flash.
customer_reviews.text: I used this light a relatively small amount of times and never abused it. It was nice and bright but sadly it started to randomly flash and not work. It is a great light but it seemed that there are issues because I noticed I am not the only one that had issues with it after about a year and a half..Like the others, it seems to be a lose solder. Perhaps they needed to solder heavier due to the intense heat the bulb produces.
customer_reviews.author: Jcv

customer_reviews.title: Great light for your head.
customer_reviews.text: This head lamp is a good product that I use almost daily. I work nights so a good headlamp I almost a necessity for me because I do a lot of stuff outside in the dark on my days off. My only complaint is that the battery pack is on the back and is uncomfortable to rest my head on when I'm laying on a creeper while working under a car. The batteries last a long time and the multiple chargers that come with it are a plus. I bought another one for my dad because I liked mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light
customer_reviews.text: I live in the woods and need this to get to my car parked out by the road in winter. It's comfortable, bright, and easy to use. I scan the woods for animals, and their eyes glow. It makes me feel less vulnerable. I was, however, a bit unnerved to see a WOLF watching me as I pulled the sled uphill to the house... If you live where it gets dark, or you need a hands-free spot-light for outdoor tasks, then consider this. Everyone likes to borrow mine, so I know what to get people for Christimas.
customer_reviews.author: Abx

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine at first...
customer_reviews.text: For the first year or so, this light was super bright. Then the charger's indicator light turned constantly green, whether there was a battery plugged in or not, no matter the battery charge level. At the same time the headlight's output dimmed significantly. Thinking it was a battery issue, I bought a new set, which solved nothing. Even after leaving the headlight plugged into the charger for days, the light is still so dim, it is now hardly better than having no headlight at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bunjinjohn

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headlight to deliver mail in the night. It is much more than I needed to see the mail because of how bright it is. Even at its lowest setting, it's still super bright. My only complaint is how bulky it is with the battery pack attached at the back of your head. But I guess it's needed for the light to last so long and be so bright. The battery pack also has a safety light on it that is red in color so you can be seen from behind as well. It works great to ride your bike at night also.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and bright.
customer_reviews.text: A very solid purchase. I've bought 3 of these. One of them burnt out after 2 weeks of constantly swapping out batteries instead of letting it charge up properly...basically I didn't let the light cool down before inserting a fresh set of batteries. My fault. But I have had many people compliment how bright the light is...and it is. It is very comfortable on the head. Not tight, not loose, just right. The cool thing about it, is it's so easy to swap the batteries you literally don't even need to take it off your head. You just flip the back up and insert the fresh batteries. I highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as bright as it claims
customer_reviews.text: Overall I was disappointed with this headlamp and so it's getting returned. I have a Black Diamond Storm, which puts out 350 lumens, and it throws a lot more light than this GRDE headlamp which claims to throw up to 1800 lumens. If I were going to choose between the cost of this headlamp or spending a few more dollars and getting the Black Diamond, I'd definitely spend the extra for the Black Diamond.
customer_reviews.author: K. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak for longevity but for the price I felt like I got way more than I paid for. I used this for over an hour running cable under the house and it never dimmed once and stayed on my head very well. The lens retracts to narrow the focus of the light by pulling it out and can widen the light beam by pushing it in. This is a useful feature if you are trying to see something that's far away, I keep it on the wide light setting most of the time and it is amazing how bright this is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I've used the headlamp for several months, and can ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the headlamp for several months, and can provide a comprehensive review: PROS: - The rechargeable battery - The light has a bright, medium, and flashing setting - The battery lasts a long time between charges, especially on the medium light setting - The light can be focused from a narrow beam to a wide angle beam - The headlamp is well made - The user manual was poorly translated from Chinese, and is a hoot to read! CONS - The headlamp and battery pack (at the rear) are somewhat heavy. That's OK for working upright, but not for working under a vehicle. The assembly falls off my head when I'm working on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Very bright as well as adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few different style headlamp lights and very few have the adjustable light to show wide angles and narrow. Very comfortable to wear and nice adjustable straps. The brightest mode is very nice and seems even a little brighter than other recent once’s I have gotten. It is adjustable up and down and stays where you want it to without moving around. Overall very happy with it and may even get another soon for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: GRDE LED Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so impressed with an product like I have this one. This light is perfect for any application working day or night. Inside or outside. Sure beats holding a flashlight. You will complete your task in half the time. The 3 modes gives much versatility. The head band is very comfortable that you almost forget you have it on. The light beam is adjustable and the head light pivots. If you are a contractor or DIY'er, this is a must have for your tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright light
customer_reviews.text: Super bright light with multiple charging options. The battery pack on the back of your head has a red light that comes on with the headlamp. The battery pack did not seem too heavy to me. The product appears to be well built but not water proof. I used it quite bit and like the unit, unfortunately one dark and stormy night the headlamp fell out of my truck unnoticed and lay in the heavy rain overnight. The next morning i picked it up and dried it off the best i could but the headlamp now works erratically if at all. I will reorder another one and hopefully keep it dry. Maybe the manufacturer could produce a water resistant/waterproof unit?
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Grand finale then it's over.
customer_reviews.text: Went backpacking with some buddies, first night it worked great. They all asked me where I got it and who makes the light. It is so bright and battery seemed to last, it also had telescoping zoom. We could see well over 300-400ft across cliff. Second night it broke, it was over! Fully charged battery with just a trace of LED lit behind the lens. Such a shame that it's not built with quality. I am returning item. And will buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vance

customer_reviews.title: bright and comfortable headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and very comfortable headlamp. The tilt adjustment has a great secure feel so its not going to move on its own like many others. The straps are all adjustable so it fits on any size head and also fits over helmets. Great for working in dark spaces when you need both hands free. Zoom function is great for lighting up things far away. Overall, great product and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Hardik P.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries stopped charging after first use.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the product it worked great. But the second time I plugged it in to charge it the batteries wouldn't charge. Troubleshooted everything. The casing for the batteries got hot but the batteries did not. They are an odd size battery too so not easily replaceable. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget J.

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Super Bright just about says it all. I wear this a lot working on projects at home. This is the second headlamp I have purchased from this company and they hold up pretty well. The switch went bad on the last one I had but I have been using it for 3 yrs or so. This style is kind of heavy but if you don`t want to keep replacing batteries this is a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, and not too heavy on the head. I just wish the beam could be adjusted by turning rather than pushing and pulling on the light. I actually use these for night riding my off-road motorcycle which doesn't have a light, and this light works better than an actual off-road motorcycle light, so I won't ding a star just because I don't like how they engineered the beam adjustment...
customer_reviews.author: Ardsley Waxwing

customer_reviews.title: Purposeful but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The price is affordable It is rechargeable Has brightness levels and white SOS Better fit as it is adjustable and has a strap go over your head, allowing depth control. Cons: Heavy mainly because of the batteries which are not standard AA. IF the battery fails, getting a replacement may be challenging I have another pair which has a red SOS - IMO red makes more sense
customer_reviews.author: Anfield Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Strong Buy Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed an excellent product. Being a QA person, I read all the reviews on AMZN and made a weighted scorecard before making a decision. The light is *bright* - and that was the primary functionality I wanted. Following the "FURPS" model of evaluation, I can say: Functionality - bright light and emergency flasher - Excellent Usability - Easy to wear, adjustable angle of lamp, light weight, multiple charging options - Excellent Reliability - I have used this for a while now, and it works flawlessly Price/Performance - Excellent - best value for the money Serviceability - Well, I did not have to call support, and I don't think I will Yes, I strongly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Maha-Guru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - fits good, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working on projects in low light and also for law enforcement activities. Powered by two 18650 batteries it is bright and lasts a LONG time. The lamp is adjustable up and down in the bracket, and the beam also zooms in and out. The beam has three settings: high, low, and strobe (don't know why I would want strobe). It has a red light on the back. Several colleagues have headlights that are other brands/styles. I wanted one that operated on 18650 batteries so I bought this one. Mine is definitely better than the others.
customer_reviews.author: The Professor

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Wow this things bright! It has a very nice even wide beam and can be focused for a insanely focused beam. For the price, this things amazing! Pros: * bright! * uses 18650 recharable/replaceable lithium batteries * red light in back is good for biking/camping for viability * plenty of recharge options * long battery life Cons: *heavy but not unreasonable * battery compartment is closed using a flimsy piece of flexible silicon. I've never had batteries fall out as it's against your head in use but it feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for when she feeds her rabbits in the evenings because she walked by a cougar one night without seeing it on her way to the bunny barn. Her dog chased it off but after that she wanted to be able to see better on her way out and back and for when she takes her dog out at night to do his business. She loves it, it is super bright and she can see all around us into the woods between the house and barn etc. with no problems. It's brighter than just about any flashlight we own and it leaves her hands free for pouring feed and water etc.
customer_reviews.author: A. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light, extremely bright!
customer_reviews.text: I was not paid or compensated for my honest opinion/ review. I have not used it for working out, so I will not rate that, all other areas I'd give a 10 star if I could. This light is extremely bright, not to heavy, with adjustable head strap and rechargeable battery, makes this a great deal, I would buy it again, recommend it to others also I would give it as a gift! I love this light!
customer_reviews.author: GIGI

customer_reviews.title: 110 volt charger went out, and they replaced it after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in June 2016 to prepare equipment for the following year with a overland trip to Alaska. I only pluged the charger in a few times for an hour or so, I did not even use the lamp other than to test it. Today I find out the charger is not working. 2 stars.......Update : After reading my review in less than 24 hours they sent me a new 110 volt charger and two other chargers that I can use in the car and off of a computer. Thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great light, but tends to get hot at the high setting
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Bright, lasts a long time and not uncomfortably heavy. The straps are comfortable. The low setting is typically bright enough for working in a dark area (room with the power cut-off, attic, outside at night). In the high setting the lamp tends to run pretty hot, up to making it unconformable on the forehead after some long minutes. The supplied battery charger is pretty slow, but since this uses standard 18650 Li-ion batteries, any charger will work.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: You can throw out all your flashlights.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headlamp I've found yet , and I've had quite a few. Bit heavier than most but unless you're really pretty pathetic it shouldn't be an issue. I can't imagine needing more light than this throws. I'm considering buying a couple more just in case they stop making them. Haven't had any problems with battery life at full power. Only thing I didn't like is a red light on the battery pack, that site on the back of your head. It would probably be good for a bicyclist or something.. I just put electrical tape over it..
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far for mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: I mounted the headlamp to the actual helmet. The different angles that it can be set to are very useful. While in traffic, I can set it low (the angle) so the light is on me and my front tire instead of pointing to cars. While on the trail, I have ridden in absolute darkness out there in the middle of nowhere and it's bright enough for me to see way ahead. Battery seems to last a good amount of time, although I have not ridden my bike for more than 2 hours straight. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp for your money.
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp is incredibly bright and the posable lens is amazingly useful. I do electrical work and without this headlamp in particular, I'd be fighting with batteries and crappy "posable" mounts that snap back into a less ideal position. The three modes of light; super bright, slightly less super bright, and flashing, are all you need. I only ever use the slightly less super bright mode because it's quite bright enough for anything I do. Plus it's easy; two clicks on, two clicks off. Which, the button to turn it on and off is very conveniently located and easy to push. I HIGHLY recommend this headlamp, as I believe it may be the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Crombie

customer_reviews.title: Long-Lasting Rechargeable Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headlamp to use in my basement for storing boxes on shelves. The lighting isn't the best and this headlamp works perfect and the rechargeable flashlight works long enough be having to recharge. Inside the box, there are all the necessary pieces for using the headlamp. Since it is adjustable, this will fit on any size head. Even though the headlamp looks small, it is easy to adjust. It took Amazon longer than a week to deliver, even though I selected 2-day shipping, so I would have started my project earlier. I was hoping this headlamp came in other colors, but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Gladding

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I just went to Yosemite with this headlamp and it's very bright. There are two different brightness settings and an emergency "flash" setting. You can adjust the wideness of the light -- you can zoom in or out. Unfortunately there's not red light and it's a bit heavy, but overall it's great. The battery life seems to hold up. Will update in several months.
customer_reviews.author: Climbing Gal

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why you would buy a different type?
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th one I have bought - gift for my daughter. We live in Alaska and hike pretty much every day. I use these headlamps from Oct - April. As the days get shorter they get more use - great batteries, crazy bright (do not shine them in your wife's face. She will not be happy) and good quality - I have not had one break on me yet. Need light to do closeup work - very good for that. Not too heavy - I have one of the three lamp ones - don't use it much as it is too heavy and gives me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Illuminated My World
customer_reviews.text: I received this headlamp yesterday, on time, and tried it out. It is super bright and comes with a usb charger, car charger, and wall charger. So you have a few different ways of keeping it charged up for use during long periods. I got this for my little brother who works on cars sometimes late into the night. The lens is zoomable if you pull the lens out or push it in. It looks like it is very high quality too. Just make sure that you read the instructions and pull the plastic off of the batteries inside before you turn it on, and you should be all set to enjoy an awesome headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Andreamsand

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: I liked this lamp for a year, until it’s switch died. After that I had to remove the batteries to turn it off but that only worked twice, now it won’t charge. Or turn on maybe, either way, it’s not working. If I had a way to reach the seller for customer care I would but they apparently don’t want contact after 30 days so support isn’t an option. It was indisposable while it lasted. Bummer, but for the price it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sage B

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PRODUCT & CUSTOMER SERVICE IS TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a Christmas gifts 2018, first time my father-in-law went to charge it August 2019 it would not charge. If you are a purchaser, make sure you try to charge it right off the bat. Tried to talk with customer service of the manufacturer, could hardly understand what she was saying....China...guess that is what you get from China product. Will look for a MADE IN THE USA, product next time. I would not recommend buying this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: The dim setting is too bright!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the dim mode was more dim! The high setting is great for hiking and being visible. Puts out a tight spotlight usable out to about 60ft. The dim setting reduces the beam to about 60% brightness but is still too bright for late night walks around the campsite. The headset is quite heavy but the battery lasts at least 4 hours at full brightness. If you need an inexpensive headlamp, it's still a good choice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: a t.

customer_reviews.title: Good light, sketchy switch
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good optics, very bright, solid battery life Cons: Low is still very bright and gets hot in extended use. Switch died after less than a year. Great light overall, especially for the price. Doesn't compare to a Petzl, but it's a heck of a lot cheaper. For around the house where a failure isn't a huge deal, it's great. But the switch stopped working after less than a year, so I wouldn't use it for camping or climbing where a failure would be potentially dangerous. Update: my second one hasn't had the switch issue, and the seller is providing me with another spare for free, so they definitely stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: RyanR

customer_reviews.title: Psychic abilities required.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the light. The instructions are almost useless. The enclosed product description refers to things not pictured or pointed to in diagrams. It appears generally well made. Instructions say limit charge to 6hrs. An LED will change from red to green. Which LED? Where? I'm optimistic it will work based on appearance. I'm apprehensive it will melt while charging.
customer_reviews.author: t mantis

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright but a couple of nuances
customer_reviews.text: I have 2. Use them all day for work and rotate them out. The battery life has gone down but it’s easy to put in a new set of rechargeables. It’s comfy and cinches down tight but the straps pop off the plastic connectors and it falls off rather frequently. Bulky but bright. Great for the shop and camping but I wouldn’t wear it on a Via Feratta at night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Head Lamp Ever! (So far)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item for backpacking. It is the brightest light that I have ever used in the forest. I have only used it for one weekend trip but the battery life was excellent even though I used it quite a bit. It is heavier that other ultra lite backpacking headlamps. I understand the need to be lite, but the extra bright light at night makes it worth the weight. I will try to remember and update my review later, after a few more trips. One thing to note, DO NOT charge the battery over six hours. It says that in the directions, but many of us do not take the time to read those. Luckily, my wife does.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Holman

customer_reviews.title: Really bright light
customer_reviews.text: This light is really bright and focused. The head strap is sturdy and fits well. The battery does take about 8 hours to charge, and so far the light has performed really well. The only thing I don't really like is that the shape of the plastic housing of the front headlamp is a bit too curved making the top poke into my forehead, which gets annoying after a while.
customer_reviews.author: mloveridge17

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for running in the pre sunrise hours of the way too early mornings, this light is perfect! First of all, it fits securely with absolutely no bouncing or rubbing while I'm running. Secondly, this light is very bright and it has a great adjustable beam! Love that it has a red light on the back of the head for added exposure to drivers. Lastly, the fact that it is rechargeable is WONDERFUL!! The third pic is a comparison to my old headlamp, the difference is astounding! Pic 4 shows how much it lights up the pitch black backyard. Moral of the story: this is the best light I have found, it makes me feel safer running at night!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Banks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light output!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light output. I bought this headlamp to participate in a Ragnar race. The headlamp far exceeded my expectations. During night runs, everyone on my tream wanted to use this headlampninstead of their own. I even noticed a few runners huddling around me to get a better view of the path. My one gripe is that the battery pack is heavy and the batteries are massive. You get used to it after a long run though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walsh

customer_reviews.title: High lumens = bright
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a revelation and such a pleasant surprise. I use it any time that I'm building a PC or otherwise working on electronics and am in need of quality hands-free lighting. You can take it anywhere if you notice what is included -- batteries, wall charger, and car charger. Nice. It fits very comfortably. I also bought one for my brother and he said it will be extremely useful for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: As an electrician I've lost/broken more headlamps than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: As an electrician I've lost/broken more headlamps than any other tool. I use to buy the fancy bling headlamps but after you lose (2) $100+ ones you reconsider your options. I think these are bright as hell, a little bulky and can get a little hot on the head after 20 minutes but for the price, I'll keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: riclyo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, fits, powerful, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality headlamp. Pleasantly surprised to finally find one that fits so comfortably. Easily adjustable 3 point strap. The battery pack is a bit bulky but well situated in the back such that it's a non-issue. I do a lot of exterior night work and need a powerful long lasting headlamp that's comfortable with a light I can easily focus to my projects. The light can be adjusted from narrow to wide high beam or low. The flashing setting won't be useful for me but would be a useful safety feature for a cyclist.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: That's bright
customer_reviews.text: High beam really put out lumens. There is a low-beam option, which is good around the house. I like the fact that it can be focused, narrow to wide. Seven months in, and haven't had to change batteries, yet. But I don't use it often, either. So, don't know much about battery life or how to rate that. It works great on my head, adjustable to be secure, good visibility. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning1

customer_reviews.title: GRED HEADLAMP
customer_reviews.text: This light is great, and it's so bright that it lights up a trail 4 foot wide, long lasting battery . made very solid. little heavy yet feels light on head, sturdy when moving, evening a little short jog it stated on. straps are very well made and easily adjustable., light stayed on for 3 hours (on medium switch). stays cool to the touch when adjusting the light . thanks Wheat H
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: Headlamp, Super Bright LED Headlamps 18650 USB Rechargeable IPX4 Waterproof Flashlight with Zoomable Work Light, Hard Hat Light for Camping, Hiking, Outdoors
feature_bullets: Include Headlamp, 2 rechargeable batteries, Wall charger, Car Charger, Usb cable, User book.
Please remove the plastic wrap off the batteries at first time use,otherwise it cant recharge.
Lifespan reach up to 100,000 hours.Brightness up to 1800 lumens.
3-in-1Multi-Function Capability ;Can use as headlamp ,Waist lamps or Desk lamps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
